design.name: Colony Ship
design.description:
The colony ship is what you'll need to colonize remote planets. They'll carry 100 of your colony's population to a brave new world.

Colony ships are single-use. The ship is destroyed once a planet is colonized.

design.name: Scout
design.description: Scouts are small, fast ships with no attack capability (and not much in the way of defensive capabilities, either). What they are good at, though, is getting in and out of enemy starsystems and reporting back what they found.
